summary: Diff adds an Android wrapper project (Capacitor-based) under frontend/android and a new build guide file, but the provided documentation appears truncated/incomplete in the diff summary and many unrelated frontend UI changes were also introduced that were not requested by REQ-13.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a README (or clearly named documentation file) with step-by-step instructions to generate a debug APK locally, including prerequisites, install commands, and the output path/name of the generated APK.
missing_requirements.reason: The added documentation file shown in the diff is truncated and stops at the beginning of the Capacitor CLI section, so the required step-by-step build commands, install commands, and the exact debug APK output path/name are not evidenced in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: No backend canister changes are required (APK uses the same deployed canister endpoints as the web build).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not provide evidence about canister endpoint configuration (e.g., environment variables, network config) or explicitly state that the Android wrapper points to the same deployed endpoints; only Android wrapper files are shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Mobile-responsive UI rework across multiple pages/components (layout/header/forms/tables/dashboard typography and spacing).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-13 is solely about adding an Android APK packaging workflow and documentation; these UI/UX changes are not requested and increase scope.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout.tsx, AppHeader.tsx, EntryForm.tsx, EntriesTable.tsx, PeriodSelector.tsx, DashboardPage.tsx, EntriesPage.tsx, index.css, etc.)

hallucinated_features.description: Currency formatting changes to INR (â‚¹) and introduction of a shared currency utility, plus updating delete confirmation to show INR formatting.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-13 (Android APK packaging).

hallucinated_features.description: New mobile-only entries list component (EntriesMobileList) and corresponding EntriesTable behavior changes to switch views by screen size.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-13 (Android APK packaging).
